text: Dharmama kunai balajaphti chaina. Vastavama kumargabata sumarga prasta bha'isakeko cha. Yasartha jasale allaha baheka an'ya murtiharuma astha rakhdaina ra allahamathi astha rakhyo, usale yasto baliyo dori samatisakeko cha, juna ki kahilyai cumdne chaina. Allaha sabai kura sunnevala sarvajna ho
